name: The Cow Game Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5770 /w 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphones Recommended, Keyboard and Mouse or xBox Controller
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 970 or AMD Radeon 290
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphones Recommended, Keyboard and Mouse or xBox Controller
